title: Dotan - 7 Layers & Dream parade
description:
Dotan

On 31 January 2014 Dotan released his studio album, 7 Layers in Paradiso.[1] This album was produced by Dotan himself. The album quickly reached number 2 on the Dutch Top 100 Charts according to Dutch news website NU.nl.[2]

The first single 'Fall' was released on 17 January 2014. The second single released is called 'Home'. 'Home' was nominated SuperCrazyTurboTopHit, 3FM Megahit and Alarmschijf on Dutch Radio.
Next to several weeks at number one in the Dutch iTunes top 100, Home entered the Dutch MegaTop50 at number 1 and peaked at this chart for 4 weeks.[3] Home also became number one in Belgium on 22 August.[4] Home peaked at number 9 on the German iTunes top 100.

The album 7 Layers reached the Gold status on 25 August[5] and "Home" reached Double Platinum status. It also became Gold in Belgium. The album "7 Layers" reached Double Platinum on 15 October 2015 in the Netherlands.[6] and "Home" reached the Triple Platinum status on 23 December 2014.[7]

Dotan's Home reached number two on the Next Big Sound chart of American Entertainment website Billboard.[8]

The album 7 Layers is in the top 5 of most streamed albums in the Netherlands on Spotify[9] and number 10 in the Top 1000 of best albums in the Netherlands of all time.[10]

Hungry reached number two on the year list of 2015 of Belgium's radio station Studio Brussel.
